channel.title: Process Manager quota functions (Kernel) on GeoB99 Website
channel.description: Recent content in Process Manager quota functions (Kernel) on GeoB99 Website

item.title: PsChargeSharedPoolQuota
item.description: Description Charges the shared pool quota of a process (paged & non-paged). Internals & Parameters VOID NTAPI PsChargeSharedPoolQuota( IN PEPROCESS Process, IN ULONG PagedPoolToCharge, IN ULONG NonPagedPoolToCharge) Process is a pointer to a Executive process (EPROCESS). PagedPoolToCharge and NonPagedPoolToCharge are the argument parameters the caller has to fill the specific amount of quota to be charged for the process. What does this function do is typically expanding the quota list both to the non-paged and paged memory pools at the same time.

item.title: PsReturnSharedPoolQuota
item.description: Description Returns the shared pool quota of a process (paged & non-paged). Internals & Parameters VOID NTAPI PsReturnSharedPoolQuota( IN PEPROCESS Process, IN ULONG PagedPoolToReturn, IN ULONG NonPagedPoolToReturn) Process is a pointer to a Executive process (EPROCESS). PagedPoolToReturn and NonPagedPoolToReturn are the argument parameters the caller has to fill the specific amount of quota to be returned. What does this function do is typically giving back the quota both to the non-paged and paged memory pools at the same time.
